title: Village Square $199 move in special ask for Mari
map_address: 5025 Nellis Oasis Lane near Nellis & Cheyenne
posting_body: ['Village Square has it all!', 'CALL TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'To see a virtual tour, please click on the link below', '<URL>', 'Schedule a tour with us today and experience a Virtual Tour like no other!', 'Look and see what our community has to offer and what you have been missing!', 'We are here for you and your family during these difficult times.', 'The way to stay safe is safer at home!', 'Amenities:', '•     Air Conditioning', '•     Refrigerator', '•     Swimming Pool', '•     Laundry Facility', '•     Basketball Court', 'Location: 5025 Nellis Oasis Lane Las Vegas, NV 89115', 'Rental Information:', '0 BR/1 BA     $850', 'Application Fee: $55* | Lease Terms: 12 months *A $100.00 holding fee applies to secure a unit of the requested size.', 'Upon approval, holding deposits are applied to move-in charges and are generally refundable if not approved, but certain terms and conditions apply.', 'Additional details available on application.', '<URL>/', 'Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family communities throughout Las Vegas.', 'With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from studios to threebedroom townhomes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.', 'Enjoy stress-free living in our well maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.', 'At Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future.']
